name: Oops Loops
description:
Poor Dr. Miles was conducting an experiment and now he’s stuck in some kind of interdimensional space-time loop! Help him find the emergency power shut-off to escape the loops before it’s too late! Did we mention that Dr. Miles carries a deck of playing cards with him wherever he goes?

Latest version includes improvements to player/tile colliders and particle systems, and fixes the ability to escape the level and fall into the void forever and ever.
